{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = 802.11ac LTE/VDSL2 Gateway |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.smartrg.com/sr700ac |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = SmartRG |model = SR700ac |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, dsl modem, 4G LTE router, LTE modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = VW7SR700A, N7NMC7355 |icid = 11130A-SR700A, 2417C-MC7355 |us_id = VW7DL01ASR700A |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM63167V;BROADCOM(R), BCM63167VKREBG, TN1640 P40, 634773-11 P3A W; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q128CSIG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = EtronTech;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;B50212E;BROADCOM(R), B50212E, B1KMLG, TD1626 P21, 604464 1 W; |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53125; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SIM Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL2+, VDSL2, 4G LTE modem, SIM Card slot, TR-069, DFS (master), |addchip = VDSL Analog Front End (LD/AFE);Broadcom;BCM6303;;1; ,,, Dual Channel Subscriber Line Interface Circuit (miSLIC);Microsemi;Le9642;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = SmartRG-XXXX, SmartRG-5G-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Kasda |manuf_model = KW6262C |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/19/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC7354 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (USB) |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1605 P11, 568887-17 3A W; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "KW6262C REV:1.1 2016.08.09" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *Kasda KW6262C - ''AC1600 Wireless Dual Band 4G LTE Router'' • [http://www.kasdanet.com/ENHCSZ/pro_view-105.html PPage] : Processor: [[Broadcom]] BCM63167 + BCM43602 + BCM53125 : ADSL/VDSL: [[Broadcom]] BCM6303 + ''Microsemi'' Le9642 : 4G: FDD-LTE Cat4 (800/900/1800/2100/2600 MHz) : 4G: TDD-LTE Cat4 (1900/2350/2500/2600 MHz) : 3G: TD-SCDMA (2010~2025, 1880~1920 MHz) : 3G: WCDMA (900/1900/2100 MHz)
*[[Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC7354]] - 4G LTE Mini PCIe Card :FCC ID: [http://fccid.io/N7NMC7355 N7NMC7355] (2012-11-28) {{See also|Sierra Wireless}} <small> Marketing materials claim one USB 2.0 port although it is not populated in pictures</small>
==See also== *[[ZISA V800AC-LTE]] - AC1600 VDSL2/VoIP LTE WiFi Router • [http://zisacom.com/c/default/pageId/5541dd482034da9f368b45ce/articleId/593fa6569ccde2f40c4a7810 PPage] :Chipset: [[Broadcom]] BCM63167 + BCM53134S (switch) :Flash: 128MB (NAND), RAM: 128MB (DDR3) :Wi-Fi: BCM63167 (2T2R 802.11bgn 2.4GHz) :::+ BCM43602 (3T3R 802.11ac 5GHz) :Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN, 1x USB 2.0 :LTE: [[Qualcomm]] MDM9x20 Cat4 TDD :Voice (VoIP): ''[[Microsemi]]'' LE9642 *[[ZISA V105WL]] - N300 VDSL2 WiFi Router • [http://zisacom.com/c/default/pageId/5541dd482034da9f368b45ce/articleId/5584268577eb068e6a8b4569 PPage] :Chipset: [[Broadcom]] BCM63381 + BCM50210 (PHY) :Flash: 16MB (NOR), RAM: 64MB (DDR) :Wi-Fi: BCM43217 (2T2R 802.11bgn 2.4GHz) :Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN, 2x USB 2.0 :ADSL/VDSL: [[Broadcom]] BCM6303 :Voice (VoIP): ''[[Microsemi]]'' LE9642 *[[ZISA V104WL-H]] - N300 VDSL2 WiFi Router • [http://zisacom.com/c/default/pageId/5541dd482034da9f368b45ce/articleId/5928f7d09ccde2606c6e568f PPage] :Chipset: [[Broadcom]] BCM63381 + BCM50212 (PHY) :Flash: 16MB (NOR), RAM: 64MB (DDR) :Wi-Fi: BCM43217 (2T2R 802.11bgn 2.4GHz) :Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x FE LAN, 2x USB 2.0 :ADSL/VDSL: [[Broadcom]] BCM6303 *[[ZISA DOCSIS 3.0]] - DOCSIS 3.0 Wireless Gateway with EMTA • [http://zisacom.com/c/default/pageId/5541dd482034da9f368b45ce/articleId/594398dd9ccde222544a7810 PPage] :Chipset: [[Broadcom]] BCM3383Z + BCM53124S (switch) :Wi-Fi: BCM43217T (2T2R 802.11bgn 2.4GHz) :Flash: 32MB (NOR)/1MB (NOR) + 128MB (NAND) :Memory: RAM: 128MB (DDR3) :Ports: 2x FE LAN; Power Supply: DC 12V/1A :DoCSIS 3.0, Channel Bonding: 8x4
[[Category:English Documentation]]
